thread.title: NASA Sees Hurricane Joaquin Growing Stronger in Atlantic
thread.title_full: NASA Sees Hurricane Joaquin Growing Stronger in the Atlantic - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: NASA Sees Hurricane Joaquin Growing Stronger in Atlantic
text: This past September 29, NASA's GPM Core and Aqua satellites flew over hurricane Joaquin , then just a tropical storm, and studied it as it was midway between the Bahamas and Bermuda. The satellites recorded rainfall, as well as cloud height and extent. The view they produced, available below, showed scientists that the storm was at the time more organized th... Â»
